argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | slwpgp.1 | |- S = ( G |`s H ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- H = H |
| 3 |  | #P_slwsubg | |- ( H e. ( P pSyl G ) -> H e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_slwispgp | |- ( ( H e. ( P pSyl G ) /\ H e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) -> ( ( H C_ H /\ P pGrp S ) <-> H = H ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_mpdan | |- ( H e. ( P pSyl G ) -> ( ( H C_ H /\ P pGrp S ) <-> H = H ) ) |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_mpbiri | |- ( H e. ( P pSyl G ) -> ( H C_ H /\ P pGrp S ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_simprd | |- ( H e. ( P pSyl G ) -> P pGrp S ) |
